thread.title: Wilson and Clarice
thread.title_full: Greenvelope.com reviewed by Wilson and Clarice

author: Wilson and Clarice
title: Wilson and Clarice
text: Greenvelope is a great alternative to sending out invitations. Gave us heaps of savings from printing costs and the tracking of the invites is like icing to the cake. Shout out to customer service for helping us when we lost our mailing... Great work! Keep it up!
